taxon_name.authority: (Sweet) C. C. Gmelin ex de Candolle in A. P. de Candolle and A. L. P. P. de Candolle

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe rudbeckiinae;genus rudbeckia;section rudbeckia;species grandiflora;variety grandiflora

bio:treatment.description: Stems hairy (hairs spreading proximally, ascending distally, ca. 1 mm). Leaves hirsute (hairs longer than 1 mm). 2n = 38.
Mostly mesic to dry prairies, woodlands;
Ark., Ga., Ill., Kans., Ky., Miss., Mo., Ohio, Okla., Tex.
bio:treatment.discussion: Variety grandiflora has been collected in Ontario; it evidently is no longer found there.
